summary: For a rich upper-class family locked into their own little world, Bolivia's social changes threaten to burst their bubble.
cast: Ninón del Castillo|Pascual Loayza|Nicolás Fernández|Juan Pablo Koria|Mariana Vargas|Viviana Condori|Luisa De Urioste|Glenda Rodríguez|Ximena Alvarez|Juana Chuquimia|Viviana Condori|Ninon del Castillo|Nicolas Fernandez|Juan Pablo Koria|Pascual Loayza|Mariana Vargas
title: Zona sur
